```{r}
#| label: asia
world_asia <- world[world$continent == "Asia", ]
asia <- st_union(world_asia)
bbox <- st_bbox(world)
plot(
  asia, 
  xlim = c(bbox["xmin"], bbox["xmax"]), 
  ylim = c(bbox["ymin"],bbox["ymax"]),
  col = "red",
  graticule = TRUE,
  axes = TRUE
)

plot(
  st_geometry(world), 
  add = TRUE
)

```
